### [Working with Border Styles and Characteristics](/documentation/pdfkit/pdfborderkey#Working-with-Border-Styles-and-Characteristics)

[`var style: PDFBorderStyle`](/documentation/pdfkit/pdfborder/style)Sets the border style.[`enum PDFBorderStyle`](/documentation/pdfkit/pdfborderstyle)PDF Kit annotation borders may have the following styles.[`var lineWidth: CGFloat`](/documentation/pdfkit/pdfborder/linewidth)Sets the line width (in points) for the border.[`var dashPattern: [Any]?`](/documentation/pdfkit/pdfborder/dashpattern)Gets the dash pattern for the border as an array of NSNumber objects.[`var borderKeyValues: [AnyHashable : Any]`](/documentation/pdfkit/pdfborder/borderkeyvalues)A dictionary that contains a deep copy of all border properties.
